name: Salt Man
description:
You're a salt shaker on a mission! Get to the dish at the end of each stage with enough salt left over to boost that flavor.

Everything uses up salt. Shooting, taking damage, and some can even leak out of your cap if you're not careful!

Version 0.1 of Salt Man is a proof of concept prototype made for Cartridge Jam 3.  It currently only contains the tutorial stage, but there's a little easter egg hidden in it.

I wish I could have poured more time into it during the jam and it's still a bit buggy but I'm planning to gradually build this up into something bigger and more refined.

Controls

The controls displayed in the game are for a Playstation controller, but any gamepad is supported.

Keyboard controls:

Left: A
Right: D
Crouch: S
Shoot: J
Guard: K
Jump: Space
Menu OK: J
Menu CANCEL (or QUIT): Esc
